title: 24: Memorize Scripts & Lines Quickly (Hollywood Secrets Part 2)
description:
Have you ever wondered how actors can memorize a movie-length script? In the second half of this two-part episode, I reveal the “Hollywood Secrets” to memorizing anything word-for-word.
